title: IPv6 Subnet Calculator
description: Calculate IPv6 subnet information with 128-bit addressing and modern network prefix notation.

tooltips.networkAddressHelp: Enter IPv6 address with prefix (e.g., 2001:db8::/64) or address only
tooltips.compressedNotation: Compressed IPv6 notation using :: for consecutive zero groups
tooltips.expandedNotation: Full 128-bit IPv6 representation with all zero groups shown
tooltips.subnetMask: IPv6 subnet mask showing network portion (compressed format)
tooltips.addressRange: First and last assignable addresses in the subnet
tooltips.assignableAddresses: Number of addresses available for host assignment (excluding network/broadcast concepts)
tooltips.reverseDns: PTR record zone for reverse DNS lookups
tooltips.binaryRepresentation: 128-bit binary representation showing network (1) and host (0) bits

visualization.showingPortionsFor: Showing network and host portions for
